content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: bricks
inventory=[{"type": "light_blue_concrete", "quantity": 46, "index": 13}, {"type": "slime_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 15}, {"type": "soul_torch", "quantity": 46, "index": 23}, {"type": "dark_oak_sign", "quantity": 8, "index": 24}, {"type": "basalt", "quantity": 33, "index": 26}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 23, "index": 29}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "command_block_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "red_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 49, "index": 38}]
thought: To craft bricks, I need to place 4 bricks in a 2x2 grid. I have 4 bricks in slot 34, so I will move one of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
